column4: anyone know why I am getting "SET failed on device wlan0 ; Operation not supported." after - iwconfig wlan0 mode ad-hoc  ???
Is it because your wlan0 device doesn't do adhoc?  Or that your wlan0 device isn't working/isn't what you think it is?
the device itself supports ad-hoc. and lsusb lists 'Bus 001 Device 003: ID 0bda:8189 Realtek Semiconductor Corp. RTL8187B '
